By  Northern Star StaffFebruary  

The Wooden Box Theater a performance group from the DeKalbSycamore area will celebrate its sixteenth anniversary tonight at the House Cafe  E PERIOD Lincoln Highway PERIOD

The troupe will be performing a collection of songs and poems entitled Unlock and Conquer PERIOD The show itself was written and directed by Wooden Box organizer Dan Sherrill PERIOD

The performance will begin at  p.m PERIOD and costs  PERIOD
